stepTitle: Why did Brian's family feel isolated from their community?
stepBody: Brian's parents say: We were seeing very little of friends or relatives at that point, because it was virtually impossible to take Brian anywhere so people had to come to us, and our house was kind of like a war zone. And I just remember the times when we were with other people, like at holidays, it was just constant stress. I either had to give up any hope to interacting with other people, or I'm going to interact with other people and feel guilty about Brian's stimming.
